text: Mickey's Surprise Party is a 1939 American animated short movie. It was produced by Walt Disney Productions. It was distributed by Nabisco. Hamilton Luske directed it. It was the 105th short in the Mickey Mouse movie series to be released, and the second for that year. Mickey's Surprise Party is the first cartoon with Mickey and Minnie Mouse in their current designs, created by animator Fred Moore. ==Other websites== * * ==References== Category:1939 movies Category:Disney animated movies Category:Movies directed by Hamilton Luske
title: Mickey's Surprise Party
